sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update sysID for post chat survey.</description> <name>Update sysID for post chat survey</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_survey'); gr.addQuery('survey', 'a259f6969f3220100d74d46d842e702a'); //sysID of survey created in Rome. gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { gr.setValue('survey', '45c86b0eeb2330106e6b2ed628522899'); //sysID of updated survey in San Diego. gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-08 14:43:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d6f66b21eb940110bcf32ed628522871</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update sysID for post chat survey</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Virtual Agent Platform Topic Blocks" source="com.glide.cs.topic_blocks">289d7c203c75311068bcf327dfe37f6e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d6f66b21eb940110bcf32ed628522871</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-14 13:03:04</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update sysID for post chat survey
